message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable, how about a 52.5 / 47.5 split?
Meet me in the middle, 57.5-42.5 is a fair compromise.
Time is running out, I'm moving closer to your offer. 51.25 / 48.75?
I'll meet you closer, 56.25-43.75, don't let inflation eat our money.
